external_games.name: Dora the Explorer: Dora's World Adventure!

name: Dora the Explorer: Dora's World Adventure!
storyline: Pack your backpack for a World Adventure with Dora the Explorer! Dora needs your help to team up with Swiper to return the Friendship Bracelets he swiped to France, Tanzania, Russia, and China! From Mt. Kilimanjaro to the Great Wall of China, get ready to explore the world with Dora!
summary: Pack your backpack for a World Adventure with Dora the Explorer! Dora needs your help to team up with Swiper to return the Friendship Bracelets he swiped to France, Tanzania, Russia, and China! From Mt. Kilimanjaro to the Great Wall of China, get ready to explore the world with Dora!
